attributes.comment:
I am writing to express my disdain about the proposed increase for adoption
related petitions. As you know, there are millions of children throughout the world
waiting for forever families. For many families and children, this increase will
prohibit their adoption dream from being possible. Acceptance of this regulation
would be a devastating setback to many families who have considered adopting.

My husband and I had difficulty conceiving our first child and underwent numerous
fertility treatments to achieve a successful pregnancy. We will be exploring
adoption to increase our family in the near future and are currently unsure how we
will raise the funds necessary to adopt. This regulation could very possibly be the
final blow to eliminate our dream of adopting. Please reject this increase in fees.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
